Question: At the end of the show, Sullivan declared this person "a real decent, fine boy".
Hints: Once he became this person's manager, Colonel Tom Parker insisted on exceptionally tight control over his client's career.
The next day, this person recorded "Hound Dog", along with "Any Way You Want Me" and "Don't Be Cruel".
Music critic Henry Pleasants observes that "this person has been described variously as a baritone and a tenor.
